title: A Rioter for my 2000th win!
body:
Hello friends!

I'm sitting on 1999 normal wins (if you include my 24 dominion wins RIP) and would love to reach this new milestone with some lucky Rioters! 

Does this sound like you? Then answer the call now and help usher in the new age of my victory!

{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}}

replies.body: im drowning all the way down at 500 wins send help
